course_title: Post Graduate Diploma in International Education (PGDIE) and International Baccalaureate (IB) Educator Certificate in Teaching and learning DP (BLENDED MODE)
why_choose: Why choose this course? Obtain IBEC certification Hone professional knowledge and skills Gain hands-on experience via educational practicum Learn from esteemed practitioners and scholars at workshops Opportunity to conduct action research in the classroom Network with a professional learning community of educators
what_learn: What you will learn? Understand the nuances of international education and global learning environments. Meet the needs of the 21st Century learning from courses such as Education for Sustainable Development, Educational Technology & AI in Education, Inclusive Education. Gain deep insights about the International Baccalaureate (IB) curriculum and assessment practices. Conduct action research in the classroom Advance into School Leadership and Management Become advocates of education who promote lifelong learning.
modules: Modules Introduction to Education Curriculum Processes Learning and Assessment Semester 1 Educational Psychology Action Research in Educational Setting School Subject Pedagogy and Holistic development Leadership practices in Education Action Research Project Educational Practicum Semester 2 Professional Learning Inclusive Education AI, EdTech, and Education for Sustainability
career: Career prospects Engage with organizations focused on international education and the promotion of cross-cultural understanding. Contribute to shaping educational content, fostering meaningful learning experiences, and shaping the future of learning. Opportunities to coordinate efforts for the core elements of the International Baccalaureate Diploma Programme (IBDP). Drive innovation in education technology, creating solutions that transform and elevate the learning experience.
